languages.text: "Дело не в том, насколько далеко вы разбрасываетесь сведениями. Дело в том, насколько тщательно мы опрашиваем тех, кто ими обладает".

traits.locale_text: "Дело не в том, насколько далеко вы разбрасываетесь сведениями. Дело в том, насколько тщательно мы опрашиваем тех, кто ими обладает".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."
languages.original_text: "Дело не в том, насколько далеко вы разбрасываетесь сведениями. Дело в том, насколько тщательно мы опрашиваем тех, кто ими обладает".

traits.locale_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这个问题的关键，并不在于情报传播得是否广泛，而在于我们对掌握这些情报的人怀疑得有多么彻底。”
languages.original_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."

traits.locale_text: “这个问题的关键，并不在于情报传播得是否广泛，而在于我们对掌握这些情报的人怀疑得有多么彻底。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No es cuestión de lo extendida que esté la información, sino de la minuciosidad con la que interrogamos a quienes la poseen».
languages.original_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."

traits.locale_text: «No es cuestión de lo extendida que esté la información, sino de la minuciosidad con la que interrogamos a quienes la poseen».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「どれだけ広く情報を集めるかではなく、それを持つ者をどれだけ徹底的に問いただすかが大事なのですよ」
languages.original_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."

traits.locale_text: 「どれだけ広く情報を集めるかではなく、それを持つ者をどれだけ徹底的に問いただすかが大事なのですよ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Die Frage ist nicht, ob Ihr sie verbreitet, sondern wie intensiv wir jenen auf den Zahn fühlen, die sie besitzen."
languages.original_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."

traits.locale_text: "Die Frage ist nicht, ob Ihr sie verbreitet, sondern wie intensiv wir jenen auf den Zahn fühlen, die sie besitzen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Là n'est pas la question. Il suffit juste d'interroger la bonne personne. Minutieusement. »
languages.original_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."

traits.locale_text: « Là n'est pas la question. Il suffit juste d'interroger la bonne personne. Minutieusement. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ne kadar geniş bir kitleyle paylaştığın önemli değil, asıl önemli olan onu elinde bulunduranları ne kadar özenle sorguladığımız."
languages.original_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar geniş bir kitleyle paylaştığın önemli değil, asıl önemli olan onu elinde bulunduranları ne kadar özenle sorguladığımız."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is not a question of how widely you disseminate it, but how thoroughly we question those who possess it."
